hideRequiredMark.description: Hide required mark of all form items
hideRequiredMark.description_zh: 隐藏所有表单项的必选标记

labelAlign.description: text align of label of all items
labelAlign.description_zh: label 标签的文本对齐方式

:labelCol.description: The layout of label. You can set `span offset` to something like `{span: 3, offset: 12}` or `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}` same as with `<Col>`
:labelCol.description_zh: label 标签布局，同 `<Col>` 组件，设置 `span offset` 值，如 `{span: 3, offset: 12}` 或 `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}`

:wrapperCol.description: The layout for input controls, same as `labelCol`
:wrapperCol.description_zh: 需要为输入控件设置布局样式时，使用该属性，用法同 labelCol

colon.description: change default props colon value of Form.Item (only effective when prop layout is horizontal)
colon.description_zh: 配置 Form.Item 的 colon 的默认值 (只有在属性 layout 为 horizontal 时有效)

validateOnRuleChange.description: whether to trigger validation when the rules prop is changed
validateOnRuleChange.description_zh: 是否在 rules 属性改变后立即触发一次验证

methods.name: validate
methods.description: validate the whole form. Takes a callback as a param. After validation, the callback will be executed with two params: a boolean indicating if the validation has passed, and an object containing all fields that fail the validation. Returns a promise if callback is omitted
methods.description_zh: 对整个表单进行校验的方法，参数为一个回调函数。该回调函数会在校验结束后被调用，并传入两个参数：是否校验成功和未通过校验的字段。若不传入回调函数，则会返回一个 promise

methods.name: validateField
methods.description: validate one or several form items
methods.params: Function(props: array | string, callback: Function(errorMessage: string))
methods.description_zh: 对部分表单字段进行校验的方法

methods.name: resetFields
methods.description: reset all the fields and remove validation result
methods.description_zh: 对整个表单进行重置，将所有字段值重置为初始值并移除校验结果

methods.name: clearValidate
methods.description: clear validation message for certain fields. The parameter is prop name or an array of prop names of the form items whose validation messages will be removed. When omitted, all fields' validation messages will be cleared
methods.description_zh: 移除表单项的校验结果。传入待移除的表单项的 prop 属性或者 prop 组成的数组，如不传则移除整个表单的校验结果

events.name: submit
events.description: After the data validation is successful, the event is called
events.description_zh: 数据验证成功后回调事件

events.name: validate
events.description: triggers after a form item is validated
events.params: 被校验的表单项 prop 值，校验是否通过，错误消息（如果存在）
events.description_zh: 任一表单项被校验后触发
